Game.Name: Tsuppari Oozumou - Heisei Ban (Japan)
Game.plot: Cute sumo wrestling game.http://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Tsuppari_Dai_Sumo.htmCheat: Practice ModeAt the title screen, press Up, Up, Down, Right, Down, Left, Run.Cheat: Max StatsStart a new game, and at the character creation screen, first select the first eyes from the right, then the second nose from the left and finally the second mouth from the right. Now, press Select for the name entry screen and enter the following Japanese characters (format is Row #, Column #): - 8,4 - 7,7 - 3,3 -. Press Run to start, and if done right, you'll have a character with max stats.Cheat: Max StatsStart a new game, and at the character creation screen, first select the second eyes from the left, then the second nose from the right and finally the fourth mouth from the left. Now, press Select for the name entry screen and enter the following Japanese characters (format is Row #, Column #): - 1,7 - 2,2 - 1,3 - 2,3 -. Press Run to start, and if done right, you'll be able to play as Yokozuna.
